steps.content: The top menu bar provides various functions which operate on the whole dataset:
‘Export dataset data’- Exports the whole dataset into a downloadable file
‘Delete dataset data’- Deletes all the data in the dataset
‘Validate’- Runs validations for the whole dataset NB: This can take some time
‘Show validations’- Shows a table of all the validation issues found across the whole dataset
‘QC rules’ – shows a list of all the validations which have been created for the dataset
‘Dashboards’ - Provides a visualization of the validation feedback
‘Manage copies’ - Functionality to save copies of the data
‘Refresh’- After import, validation and restore copy, you need to refresh the tables
This menu bar provides functionality applicable to the selected (visible) table
‘Import’- import data into the table from an external file
‘Export table data’- export data from the table into an external file
Delete table data’- Deletes all the data in the selected table
‘Validation filter’- Show/hide records based on validation results
Column heading – however the mouse over the ‘i’ icon to see a pop-up with the field type and description
Below the table are buttons to add single records or paste single or multiple records
Navigate back to the dataflow overview using the breadcrumb. The delivery of the data is triggered from the dataflow page
